sentences.en: Advertising is the rattling of a stick inside a swill bucket.
sentences.cn: 广告就是在拿根棍子在泔水桶里搅动产生的卡嗒声.

sentences.en: Do you swill out the milkpan?
Don't swill the tealeaves out into the sink.
Give the pail a good swill ( out ) .
He does nothing but swill beer all day.
sentences.cn: 他整天什么事也不干，就是拼命喝啤酒。

sentences.en: I wouldn't know though, I swill have much to learn.
sentences.cn: 我虽然知道的不是很多, 但我有很多的要学.

sentences.en: It is a good vaccine, particularly in pigs fed on swill.
sentences.cn: 这是一种良好的疫苗, 尤其对喂饲残羹的猪.

sentences.en: Leslie swill attend to students'intonation, coordination and accent of speaking attentively.
sentences.cn: 改善同学的语调 、 速度和连贯性等.

sentences.en: Please swill out the dirty basin.
Pour the swill through a sieve, or it will clog the sewer.
sentences.cn: 倒泔水时过滤一下, 否则容易堵塞下水道.

sentences.en: Swill the car with clear water.
This swill is awful. Please give me some beer.
sentences.cn: 这种烈性酒太可怕了, 请给我来点啤酒.

sentences.en: We heard the swill of flood waters.
sentences.cn: 我们听到洪水的冲击声.

sentences.en: What the fug is that swill?
sentences.cn: 这乌七八糟的是什么玩意儿?

sentences.en: Where did you get this monkey swill?
sentences.cn: 你从哪儿弄到这种“骚猴尿”的?

sentences.en: You feed them swill and such stuff?
sentences.cn: 你肯定喂了它们剩饭残羹这类东西了 吧 ?

trans.tran_cn: 泔脚饲料，猪食，<非正>（谈话或写作中的）无意义的话，废话
涮, 冲洗, 痛饮, 倒出
trans.tran_en: to wash something by pouring a lot of water over it or into it

trans.tran_cn: 冲洗，猛喝，大口喝，（使）液体流动
